requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600/AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB/AMD Radeon R9 380 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Be advised! Is still in development, so these requirements are subject to change before the release!
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB /AMD Radeon RX 590 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Be advised! Is still in development, so these requirements are subject to change before the release!

results.name: Street Preacher 4: The Devil Wears Prada
